Today, Gower is lighting up with 3 ft @9s SW swell and fresh 18 mph E winds. Broughton Bay and Llangennith Beach are your top picks, offering clean conditions during their best tide windows. Tomorrow, the swell drops to 2 ft @7s SSW, with similar winds, making for a quieter day but still some fun at Llangennith and Horton. By the day after, conditions remain mellow at 2 ft @7s SSW with light 6 mph ENE winds, perfect for a laid-back session. Best: today.
